alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 9:39PM EST until December 12 at 7:34AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Merrimack and Belknap Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water up to Bachelder Road in Allenstown. Waterfront campsites impacted, campers should move to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM EST Monday was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 4.1 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
